PMT position table for custom PMT placement. The direction is just for referenec but not used.
We will need a PMT_id later to identity which PMT is which.
Type is used to specified which PMT to be placed in hybrid configuration
Section is: 0 = barrel, 1 = top cap, 2 = top border ring, 3 = bottom cap, 4 = bottom border ring

Type Section  X(cm)     Y(cm)       Z(cm)          DirX         DirY        DirZ   Rotation(deg)  Use

#DATASTART
